title: 日本ダービーの後に・勝利のタグ！

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Matikanetannhauser has conquered the 2400 meters!
(Whaaa——!)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...I did it...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Y-y-y-y-y-y, I did it~~~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I got it, Trainer!!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Matikanetannhauser!?
No way, I'm shocked...!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
I can't believe Mihono Bourbon lost!
Rice Shower was running well too...

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text:
Hey, look over there!
Mihono Bourbon and Rice Shower are——

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
...! I couldn't reach it...!
I couldn't change again...!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: That's not true.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
You've leveled up significantly since the 'Satsuki Sho'.
I could definitely feel it through your mark.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: You'll surely be the threat in the 'Kikuka Sho'.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Thank you, Bourbon-san...
Rice, Rice...!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Next time, I'll definitely get first place...!
I'll become a Rice I can be proud of...!
(Murmur...!)

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: No, I definitely read a bit about it in a quick online article the other day!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text:
I read that too!
It said Mihono Bourbon is keeping an eye on her.
I thought it was just exaggerated writing, but——

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Wow, I can't believe it was true...!
I'm suddenly looking forward to the 'Kikuka Sho'!
Cheers and applause equal to those directed at Matikanetannhauser enveloped the two.

text_block_list.name: Spectator C
text_block_list.text: Look, 'Mihono Bourbon' and 'Rice Shower' are trending!

text_block_list.name: Spectator D
text_block_list.text: Machitan won, but... I don't know. Isn't that a bit rude?

text_block_list.name: Spectator C
text_block_list.text: ...Hey, as long as it doesn't get out of hand.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh, now that you mention it, I think more people were applauding Bourbon-san and the others?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, no, no! I just mean, yeah, that's how it was~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's Rice-san and Bourbon-san, after all. They're hot topics. It's normal to focus on them.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Besides, what matters is winning! In that sense, it's a perfect score!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh, right. Trainer, want to take a photo together? I want to post it on SNS!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Actually, I've always dreamed of using the '#DerbyConquest' tag!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ——'I won the Japan Derby! I was so fired up, it really felt like a dream! I'll do my best in the Kikuka Sho too! (elephant emoji)'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Hey, Trainer. What do you think? Is this good? Should I throw in a joke or two?
choice_data_list: I think that's a good comment as is

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Great! Then I'll send it~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Phew, one task done! Truly cleaning up after a dream——

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ahhh!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...I forgot to add the tag...!
In any case, the 'Japan Derby' closed its curtains with a wonderful result.
A few days later.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well, it's about the comments on my post from the 'Japan Derby' the other day...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: 'Truly, in competition, there's only winning and losing. I want to learn from that attitude!'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: 'Things like attention and whatnot—if the person herself isn't bothered by it, it's not something for others to fuss over.'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: That's how everyone is, isn't it? Huh, what's this about? Attention and whatnot...?
Actually, after the 'Japanese Derby,' while she placed first, other Umamusume were getting more attention, sparking arguments among fans.
But Matikanetannhauser herself didn't care at all, expressing her joy perfectly normally.
Her honest demeanor earned high praise online, leading to this situation——

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Is this... time for the secret art of ego-searching!?
From start to finish, she really didn't seem to know.
She probably never imagined she'd be at the center of such an incident.
Anyway... next is the 'Kikuka Sho.' As always, I don't plan on losing.
